animeDescription: A cup noodle commercials where [Kuro] Hiyoko-chan, the mascot of the "Chikin Ramen" line from Nissin, uses black magic to summon devil powers to turn into [Kuro] Hiyoko Akuma. This year marked the 60th anniversary of instant noodles' invention.
animeRelated: ['Other: Samurai Noodles: The Originator', 'Character: Chikin Ramen x Gudetama']
